mapper.select: select id, module_id, key_code, lang, descriptions, version_number, deleted, enabled from sys_front_key k where k.lang = 'zh_CN' and not exists (select 1 from sys_front_key sfk where sfk.key_code = k.key_code and sfk.lang = #{lanugage})

select id, module_id, key_code, lang, descriptions, version_number, deleted, enabled from sys_front_key k where k.enabled = 1 and k.deleted = 0
and k.key_code like concat(concat('%',#{keyCode}),'%')
and k.descriptions like concat(concat('%',#{descriptions}),'%')
and (k.descriptions like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or k.key_code like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%'))
and k.lang = #{lang}
and k.module_id = #{moduleId}
order by key_code
